TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GenericWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart

summary.span: 对不是 控件的服务器控件进行包装，使其在运行时与真正的 控件具有相同的外观和行为。

span.span: Wraps server controls that are not controls so that they can appear and behave as true controls at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件存在，以提供不是控件的服务器控件的运行时包装 程序，以便可以在 Web 部件页面和应用程序中使用此类控件。The control exists to provide a run-time wrapper for server controls that are not controls, so that such controls can be used in Web Parts pages and applications. 当开发人员将服务器控件（例如用户控件、ASP.NET 服务器控件或现有的自定义控件）添加到 控件时， 控件将在运行时自动包装服务器控件，以便它们可以表现出与真实控件相同的功能 。When developers add server controls--such as user controls, ASP.NET server controls, or existing custom controls--to a control, the control automatically wraps the server controls at run time so they can exhibit the same functionality as true controls. 下表比较了控件和控件并对其进行了对比 。The following table compares and contrasts controls and controls. | 控件 control| 控件 control| |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |存在用于对不是控件的服务器控件进行 Web 部件功能，使任何 ASP.NET、自定义控件或用户控件都可以参与 Web 部件应用程序。Exists to equip server controls that are not controls with Web Parts functionality, so that any ASP.NET, custom, or user control can participate in Web Parts applications.|存在，用于创建在中内置了本机 Web 部件功能的自定义 ASP.NET 控件。Exists to create custom ASP.NET controls that have native Web Parts functionality built in. 这包括个性化设置、连接、导入和导出以及拖放功能。This includes personalization, connections, import and export, and drag-and-drop capabilities.| |永远不会在页的标记中声明。Is never declared in the markup of a page. 它仅用于在运行时包装服务器控件，并为包装控件 (或子控件) 控件的全部功能 。It exists only to wrap server controls at run time, and to give the wrapped control (or child control) the full functionality of a control.|可在设计时在页面的标记中声明，类似于 ASP.NET 服务器控件，只不过它是在区域中声明的 。Can be declared in the markup of a page at design time, like an ASP.NET server control, except that it is declared in a zone.| |包含其子控件并将其集成到 Web 部件个性化设置过程中，以便它可用作真正的 控件。Includes and integrates its child control into the Web Parts personalization process so that it can act as a true control. 这会自动发生，使开发人员可以轻松地在 Web 部件的应用程序中使用服务器控件和用户控件。This occurs automatically, which makes it simple for developers to use server controls and user controls in Web Parts applications.|将自动包含在 Web 部件的个性化设置过程中。Is automatically included in the Web Parts personalization process.| |可以通过使用方法在运行时以编程方式访问 (， 并向其传递子服务器控件) ，如真正的 控件或标准 ASP.NET 控件。Can be accessed programmatically at run time (by using the method and passing to it the child server control), like a true control or a standard ASP.NET control.|可以在运行时以编程方式访问，如标准 ASP.NET 控件。Can be accessed programmatically at run time, like a standard ASP.NET control.| 用户受益于 控制，因为它提供一致的用户体验。Users benefit from the control because it provides a consistent user experience. 任何服务器控件都可以像控件一样工作 ，并具有相同的用户界面 (UI) 元素（例如谓词、图标、标题和标头）。Any server control can be made to function like a control, and will have the same consistent user interface (UI) elements such as verbs, icons, a title, and a header. 开发人员受益于 控件，因为它使他们能够重复使用 Web 部件应用程序中的现有用户控件和服务器控件。Developers benefit from the control because it enables them to reuse existing user controls and server controls within Web Parts applications. > [!NOTE] > 创建 Web 部件页面时，无需执行任何操作即可使现有用户控件或自定义控件与控件一起包装 。When you create Web Parts pages, you do not have to do anything to enable an existing user control or custom control to be wrapped with the control. 只需 以编程方式或通过在页的标记中声明的方式将服务器或用户控件添加到区域，Web 部件控件集就会 在运行时自动使用对象包装控件。Simply add your server or user control to a zone, either programmatically or by declaring it in the page's markup, and the Web Parts control set automatically wraps your control with a object at run time. 由于放置在区域中的服务器控件 在运行时使用控件进行包装，因此开发人员可以使用普通的服务器和用户控件，就像它们是 控件一样。Because server controls that are placed in zones are wrapped with a control at run time, developers can use ordinary server and user controls exactly as if they were controls. 请注意，如果在中声明了继承自基类的自定义控件 ，这些控件将不支持内部属性的使用 。Note that, if you declare custom controls that inherit from the base class within a , these controls cannot support the use of the intrinsic properties. 因此，你不能声明 此类控件的属性，包括属性 和属性等属性 。Thus, you cannot declare the properties on such controls, including properties such as the property and the property. 相反，其他类型的服务器控件 (例如， 从) 继承的控件、用户控件和自定义控件 可以声明这些属性，因为它们支持使用 expando 属性。In contrast, other types of server controls (such as controls, user controls, and custom controls that inherit from ) can declare these properties, because they support the use of expando properties. Expando 属性实际上是可以通过接口动态添加到类的字符串 。Expando properties are actually strings that can be added to a class dynamically as a property, by means of the interface. 实现此接口的控件（包括 类及其子级）可以使用 expando 属性。Controls that implement this interface, including the class and its children, can use expando properties. 由于基类不 支持 expando 属性，因此当从类继承的自定义控件 放在中， 并 在运行时使用控件进行包装时，Web 部件控件集无法将内部属性动态添加 到自定义控件。Because the base class does not support expando properties, when a custom control that inherits from the class is placed in a and wrapped with a control at run time, the Web Parts control set cannot dynamically add the intrinsic properties to the custom control. 在这种情况下，您有两种选择。You have two choices in this case. 可以在没有属性的情况下使用自定义控件 ，也可以 在自定义控件中实现该接口，使其可以使用这些属性。You can use the custom control without the properties, or you can implement the interface in the custom control, enabling it to use the properties. 作为从继承的控件如何 使用属性的示例 ，如果在 设计时) 在区域 (中声明 ASP.NET 控件 ，即使此控件不是从类继承并且不以 本机方式包含 成员，你仍可以将其视为完全不包含成员 。As an example of how controls that inherit from can use the properties, if you declare an ASP.NET control in the markup of a page (within a zone) at design time, even though this control does not inherit from the class and does not natively contain members, you can still treat it exactly like a control. 可以 在 calendar 控件上声明属性，如 、 和其他。You can declare properties on the calendar control, such as , , and others. 在运行时，可以使用 方法（该方法返回 动态包装日历控件的控件），并以编程方式与使用控件完全相同的方式进行处理，并可 访问所有相同的属性、事件和方法。At run time, you can use the method, which returns the control that is dynamically wrapping the calendar control, and work with it programmatically exactly as you would with a control, with access to all the same properties, events, and methods. 控件具有一个关键属性，可用于访问其基础服务器控件： 属性。The control has a critical property that allows you to access its underlying server control: the property. 此属性允许开发人员以编程方式访问服务器控件。This property allows developers to programmatically access the server control. 如果设置了属性，则控件也使用属性 来访问子控件中的个性化设置数据，并执行授权 。The property is also used by the control to access personalization data from the child control, and to perform authorization, if the property is set. 控件具有多个其他属性，所有这些属性都重写从基类继承的属性 。The control has several other properties, all of which override properties inherited from the base class. 如前所述，可以将这些属性与任何子控件一起使用，以便它能够作为 控件。As noted, you can use these properties with any child control, so that it can behave as a control. 一个重要的属性是 属性; 它确定是否可以导出所有的可导出属性（或只是标记为不敏感的属性）。One important property is the property; it determines whether all the exportable properties, or only those marked as non-sensitive, can be exported. 从类继承的面向 UI 的属性（如、、、、 和 ）可以在放置于区域中的任何服务器控件的声明性标记中设置 。The UI-oriented properties inherited from the class, such as , , , , , and , can be set in the declarative markup for any server control that is placed in a zone. 类中的重要方法 包括 方法，该方法可创建控件的集合 (包括与控件相关联) 的子控件 ，以及将 所有呈现委托给已包装的子控件的方法。Important methods in the class include the method, which creates the collection of controls (including child controls) associated with a control, and the method, which delegates all rendering to the wrapped child controls. 类的构造函数 是受保护的，旨在供内部使用或用于扩展性方案。The constructors on the class are protected and are intended either for internal use or for extensibility scenarios. 使用控件有一些更有用的见解 。There are some additional helpful insights for working with controls. 如果要为类中重写的属性设置默认值 ，则用户控件或自定义服务器控件可以实现 和 接口，并重写它们的成员。If you want to set default values for the overridden properties in the class, your user control or custom server control can implement the and interfaces, and override their members. 在运行时， 控件将从实现接口的子控件获取其实现的属性的值。At run time, the control will get its values for the implemented properties from the child control that implements the interfaces. 如果控件通过使用 metadata 特性) 将其任何属性定义为可个性化的 (`Personalizable` ，则 控件将在运行时自动启用这些属性以便进行个性化，就像控件上的可个性化属性一样 。If your control defines any of its properties as personalizable (by using the `Personalizable` metadata attribute), the control automatically enables those properties for personalization at run time, just like the personalizable properties on a control. 如果要为控件提供 Web 部件编辑功能，可以实现 接口。If you want to provide Web Parts editing features for your control, you can implement the interface. 在运行时，当 调用方法时，属性的 控件代码 将调用到子控件中的相同属性，并使用子控件的实现来创建关联的自定义 控件。At run time, when the method is called, the control's code for the property will call into the same property in the child control, and use the child control's implementation to create associated custom controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示控件如何 在运行时自动包装不是控件的服务器控件 。The following code example demonstrates how the control automatically wraps a server control that is not a control at run time. 此代码示例的第一部分包含一个 Web 部件页面，其中包含两个 控件。The first part of the code example contains a Web Parts page with two controls. 每个区域中都是标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件。Within each zone is a standard ASP.NET server control. 由于控件在区域中，因此在 编译页面时，这些控件将自动与控件一起包装 。Because the controls are in a zone, they will be automatically wrapped with a control when the page is compiled. 因此，可以 在这些控件上声明类属性。So, you can declare class properties on these controls. 在浏览器中加载页面后，如果单击 "**显示所有属性值**" 按钮，则每个控件的详细信息将显示在标签中。After you load the page in a browser, if you click the **Display All Property Values** button, the details for each control are displayed in a label. 若要显示 控件的工作方式， 第一个区域中的控件在 .aspx 页的声明性标记中设置了某些属性，而该控件没有 。To show how the control works, the control in the first zone has some of the properties set in the declarative markup of the .aspx page, whereas the control does not. 加载页面后，请注意两个控件的属性值之间的差异，并且两者都具有父 控件。After you load the page, note the differences in the property values for the two controls, and that both have a parent control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示以编程方式访问控件的某些属性的分部类 。The second part of the code example shows a partial class that accesses some properties of the control programmatically. 请注意，在 `Page_Load` 方法中， 方法用于检索包装服务器控件的控件的运行时实例 。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the method is used to retrieve the run-time instance of the control that wraps a server control. 这种获取对父控件的引用的方法 使你能够以编程方式使用普通服务器或用户控件，就像它 在运行时是控件。This approach of getting a reference to the parent control enables you to work programmatically with an ordinary server or user control as if it were a control at run time. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#3)]

para.span: 有些情况下，需要从 类继承。

span.span: There are few occasions where it is necessary to inherit from the class.

para.span: 如果开发人员希望在创建控件时在构造函数中实现某些自定义操作，则会出现这种情况 。

span.span: One such case would be if a developer wants to implement some custom action in the constructor when a control is created.

para.span: 例如，你可能想要将子控件存储在类中除控件集合以外的位置 。

span.span: For example, you might want to store the child control somewhere other than the control collection within the class.

para.span: 如果从 类继承，还需要从 类继承并重写其方法，以 使其能够创建自定义控件。

span.span: If you inherit from the class, you also need to inherit from the class and override its method to enable it to create your custom control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Overview
Web Parts Control Set Overview
Web Parts Personalization Overview
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

span.span: Initializes a new instance of a control by passing in a reference to a control that becomes the child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 构造函数由 控件在其方法中调用 ，以便 通过传入对子服务器控件的引用来初始化控件的实例。The constructor is called by the control in its method, to initialize an instance of a control by passing in a reference to a child server control. 创建对象后，可以使用属性引用子控件 。After the object is created, you can reference the child control using the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的 URL，该图像在控件目录中表示一个 控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image that represents a control in a catalog of controls.

value.span: 表示图像的 URL 的字符串，该图像用于在目录中表示控件。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image used to represent the control in a catalog.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件应用程序通常会提供一个目录 (或) 列表，用户可将这些控件添加到页面中。Web Parts applications often provide a catalog (or list) of controls that users can add to a page. 控件的属性包含图像的 URL，该图像在目录中出现时表示该控件。The property on a control contains the URL to an image that represents the control when it appears in a catalog. 此属性将重写基属性，以便可以访问子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的 控件一样。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在网页的声明性标记中，也可以通过编程方式设置控件的属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要在每次使用控件时为属性提供默认值，可以实现 接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例的完整源代码位于概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 此代码示例的第一部分演示了如何 在控件内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性 。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示当用户单击 "**显示所有属性值**" 按钮时，以编程方式访问属性值的方法。The second part of the code example demonstrates the method that programmatically accesses the value of the property when a user clicks the **Display All Property Values** button. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取对子控件的引用，该子控件在运行时将由 控件包装。

span.span: Gets a reference to the child control that is wrapped by a control at run time.

value.span: 引用被包装的子控件的 。

span.span: A that refers to the wrapped child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供访问由控件包装的子控件的方法 。The property provides the means to access the child control wrapped by a control. 例如， 控件使用 属性从子控件提取个性化设置数据。For example, the control uses the property to extract personalization data from the child control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 以编程方式访问属性以检索有关控件的子控件的信息 。The property is accessed programmatically to retrieve information about the child control of a control. 该示例的完整源代码位于概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 由 ASP.NET 页框架调用，以通知服务器控件在准备回发或呈现时使用基于撰写的实现来创建其所包含任何子控件。

span.span: Called by the ASP.NET page framework to notify server controls that use composition-based implementation to create any child controls they contain in preparation for posting back or rendering.

summary.span: 重写基方法，以创建由 控件所包装的子控件组成的只读集合。

span.span: Overrides the base method to create a read-only collection that consists of the child control wrapped by a control.
A that contains the child control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法创建一个专用的只读集合，该集合包含一个控件的子控件 。The method creates a private, read-only collection that consists of a single control, which is the child control of a control. 创建此集合是为了使开发人员不能手动将其他控件添加到 控件。This collection is created so that developers cannot manually add other controls to a control. 如果要在 不将子控件添加到专用集合的情况下创建自定义控件，可以从类派生 ，重写 构造函数，并提供不同的方法来存储由属性引用的子控件 。If you want to create a custom control without adding the child control to the private collection, you can derive from the class, override the constructor, and provide a different method for storing the child control referenced by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPartCollection CreateEditorParts ();

summary.span: 返回自定义 控件的集合，这些控件可用于在 控件的子控件处于编辑模式时对其进行编辑。

span.span: Returns a collection of custom controls that can be used to edit the child control of a control when it is in edit mode.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含与服务器控件关联的自定义 控件。

span.span: An that contains custom controls associated with a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件进入编辑显示模式时，将调用方法。The method is called when a control enters edit display mode. 此方法将重写从类继承的基方法， 因为对于 控件，它是正在编辑的子控件，而不是 控件本身。This method overrides the base method inherited from the class because, in the case of a control, it is the child control that is being edited, not the control itself. 方法将子控件强制转换为 接口，该接口允许编辑控件。The method casts the child control to the interface, which enables the control to be edited. 此重写的方法使不是从类派生的服务器控件（ 包括 ASP.NET 服务器控件和自定义服务器控件）可作为普通控件进行编辑 。This overridden method is what enables server controls that do not derive from the class--including ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls--to be edited as normal controls.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Description { get; set; }
.property instance string Description
Public Overrides Property Description As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Description : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一条短语，该短语在服务器控件的工具提示和目录中用来概述该控件的作用。

span.span: Gets or sets a brief phrase that summarizes what a control does, for use in ToolTips and catalogs of server controls.

value.span: 字符串，简要概述控件的功能。

span.span: A string that briefly summarizes the control's functionality.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性值通常用作目录中用于提供服务器控件列表和控件标题栏中的工具提示的控件的描述性字符串。The property value is typically used as a descriptive string for a control in catalogs that provide lists of server controls, and as a ToolTip in a control's title bar. 当用户将鼠标指针置于控件标题栏中的标题文本上时，将在工具提示中显示属性的内容。The content of the property appears in a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the title text in a control's title bar. 此属性将重写基属性，以便可以访问子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的 控件一样。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在网页的声明性标记中，也可以通过编程方式设置控件的属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要在每次使用控件时为属性提供默认值，可以实现 接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例的完整源代码位于概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 此代码示例的第一部分演示了如何 在控件内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性 。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式访问属性，以便在标签中显示其值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串与 属性值连接即形成控件的完整标题。

span.span: Gets a string that is concatenated with the property value to form a complete title for a control.

value.span: 作为控件副标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that serves as a subtitle for the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以选择返回将追加到自定义控件标题的标准副标题字符串 。Use the property optionally to return a standard subtitle string that will be appended to your custom control's title. 此属性将重写基属性，以便可以访问子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的 控件一样。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 如果在 用户控件或自定义控件中实现属性来提供默认值，则 Web 部件控件集会在运行时自动将其追加到控件的属性的值， 以创建完整的标题。If you implement the property in a user control or custom control to provide a default value, the Web Parts control set automatically appends it to the value of the control's property at run time to create a complete title.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title of a control.

value.span: 一个表示部件控件的标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the title of the part control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部件控件的标题栏中的可见标题文本由 属性设置。The visible title text in a part control's title bar is set by the property. 如果没有为控件提供标题，则 Web 部件控件集会自动计算要用作标题的默认字符串。If you do not supply a title for a control, the Web Parts control set automatically calculates a default string to use as a title. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 此外，还可以提供追加到标题字符串的默认副标题。Also, it is possible to provide a default subtitle that is appended to the title string. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For details, see . 此属性将重写基属性，以便可以访问子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的 控件一样。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在网页的声明性标记中，也可以通过编程方式设置控件的属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要在每次使用控件时为属性提供默认值，可以实现 接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例的完整源代码位于概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 此代码示例的第一部分演示了如何 在控件内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性 。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式访问属性，以便在标签中显示其值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置图像的 URL，该图像用于在 控件自身的标题栏中表示该控件。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image used to represent a control in the control's own title bar.

value.span: 表示图像的 URL 的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the URL to an image.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种将图标与控件相关联的方法 。The property provides a way to associate an icon with a control. 该图标将显示在控件自己的标题栏中。The icon appears in the control's own title bar. 对于主题一致性，应用程序开发人员通常会使此图标类似于在 Web 部件控件目录中表示控件的图像 (属性) 中引用的图像 。For thematic consistency, application developers often make this icon similar to the image that represents the control in a catalog of Web Parts controls (the image referenced in the property). 在 Web 部件控件集中实现该属性时， 最终用户可以对其进行个性化设置，以更改控件的标题栏中显示的图像或图标。As it is implemented in the Web Parts control set, the property can be personalized by end users to change the image or icon that appears in a control's title bar. 此属性将重写基属性，以便可以访问子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的 控件一样。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在网页的声明性标记中，也可以通过编程方式设置控件的属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要在每次使用控件时为属性提供默认值，可以实现 接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例的完整源代码位于概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 此代码示例的第一部分演示了如何 在控件内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性 。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式访问属性，以便在标签中显示其值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取或设置有关 控件补充信息的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets a URL to supplemental information about a control.

value.span: 一个字符串，表示有关 控件更多信息的 URL。

span.span: A string that represents a URL to more information about a control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为属性分配 URL 时 ，控件的标题将变为链接。When you assign a URL to the property, the title of the control becomes a link. 此属性为最终用户提供了一种方便的方法来访问有关控件的其他信息。This property provides a convenient way for end users to access additional information about a control. 其他信息可能包括版权数据、联系数据、有关控件创建者的详细信息，或控件用途的摘要。The additional information could include copyright data, contact data, details about the creator of the control, or a summary of the purpose of a control. 此属性将重写基属性，以便可以访问子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的 控件一样。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 您可以在网页的声明性标记中，也可以通过编程方式设置控件的属性的值。You can set values for the property on your control in the declarative markup of a Web page, as well as programmatically. 若要在每次使用控件时为属性提供默认值，可以实现 接口。To provide a default value for the property whenever the control is used, you can implement the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和编程方式使用 属性。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the property. 该示例的完整源代码位于概述主题的 "示例" 部分 。The complete source code for the example is found in the Example section of the overview topic. 此代码示例的第一部分演示了如何 在控件内的服务器控件上以声明方式设置属性 。The first part of the code example shows how the property is set declaratively on a server control within a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpartcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpartvb.aspx#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分演示如何以编程方式访问属性，以便在标签中显示其值。The second part of the code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically to display its value in a label. [!code-csharp[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/CS/genericwebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_GenericWebPart_Overview/VB/genericwebpart.vb#4)]

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection Verbs { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection Verbs
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Verbs As WebPartVerbCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartVerbCollection ^ Verbs { System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPartVerbCollection ^ get(); };
member this.Verbs : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbCollection

summary.span: 获取与 控件关联的自定义谓词的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of custom verbs associated with a control.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含与 控件关联的自定义 对象。

span.span: A that contains custom objects associated with a control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 谓词派生自 类，并提供用户界面 (UI) 用户可对控件执行的操作 。Verbs derive from the class, and provide user interface (UI) actions that users can perform on a control. 通常，谓词在用户界面中表示为按钮、链接或菜单项。Usually, verbs are represented in the UI as buttons, links, or menu items. 有一些标准谓词可用于打开、关闭、编辑和最小化控件，以及用于导出控件定义或加载帮助文件的其他谓词。There are standard verbs for opening, closing, editing, and minimizing a control, and other verbs for exporting a definition for the control or loading a Help file. 这些谓词不包含在集合中 ，因为该集合仅包含自定义谓词。These verbs are not included in the collection, because the collection contains only custom verbs. 此属性将重写基属性，以便可以访问子控件上的属性，就像它是真正的 控件一样。This property overrides the base property so that you can access the property on the child control as if it were a true control. 如果子控件实现 接口，并因此重写其 属性，则在对 控件调用属性时，控件将使用子控件的实现 。If you child control implements the interface and thus overrides its property, the control uses the child control's implementation when the property is invoked on the control. 当你创建自定义谓词并将其添加到 集合时，你可以从控件以编程方式访问谓词 。When you create custom verbs and add them to the collection, you can then access the verbs programmatically from a control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public override object WebBrowsableObject { get; }
.property instance object WebBrowsableObject
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property WebBrowsableObject As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ WebBrowsableObject { System::Object ^ get(); };
member this.WebBrowsableObject : obj

summary.span: 获取对子控件的引用，以使该控件可由自定义 控件进行编辑。

span.span: Gets a reference to the child control, to enable the control to be edited by custom controls.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包括 控件的子控件。

span.span: An that consists of the child control of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果子控件实现了 接口，并重写了其 属性，则当用户选择控件进行编辑时， 控件将通过属性调入子控件 ，并使用该方法的子控件实现 。If a child control implements the interface, and overrides its property, when a user selects the control for editing, the control will call into the child control through the property, and use the child control's implementation of the method. 此机制允许不是控件的服务器控件或用户控件 使用 Web 部件应用程序中的自定义关联控件。This mechanism allows a server or user control that is not a control to work with custom associated controls in a Web Parts application.

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in pixels) of the control.
A that indicates the width of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性将重写基属性，以便在子控件上获取或设置宽度，就像它是真正的 控件一样。This property overrides the base property so that you can get or set the width on the child control as if it were a true control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
